description:
Take control of your future by strategically designing your career. This course will empower you to plan the direction of your career’s future.
Through this course you can:

Master the art of connecting your education and experience into an effective selling message
Learn how managing relationships can help you land job interviews
Create a standout resume
Begin to develop your personal brand
Prepare for your next job interview

 
Regardless of your situation, whether you are looking for a new job or preparing to make a career transition, you will benefit from thoughtful career planning.
title: Designing and Connecting Your Career
